entry.def: The deceased is used to refer to a particular person or to particular people who have recently died.

example.ex: The identities of the deceased have now been determined.
example.tran: 死者的身份现在已经确定。

entry.def: A deceased person is one who has recently died.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who is no longer alive;

sentences.sentence: "I wonder what the dead person would have done"
